backend/main.mo: Defines data types for games, quizzes, sounds, and coloring templates, and includes logic for localization and converting complex data into simplified forms.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing UI pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables and theme layers for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry enabling Android WebView audio detection and registering the Service Worker for offline support.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service Worker implementing offline caching with precache, stale-while-revalidate assets, and navigation fallback.
frontend/README.md: Documentation describing app features, offline support, sound system usage, and Android WebView/bridge-only audio behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and manages navigation between home, games, quiz, and coloring pages with age selection and background music.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicS: Provides a modal for selecting background music using radio options tied to the music context.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Displays a celebration dialog with confetti, messages, and optional quiz results, triggering sound and animations on open.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Canvas-based coloring tool supporting drawing, undo, clearing, zoom gestures, and template image loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a decorative footer with animated star and sparkles icons.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Generates and presents age-appropriate logic puzzles, tracks progress, validates answers, and signals completion.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Generates age-based math problems with multiple-choice answers and tracks score and progress through a set number of questions.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Implements a themed memory matching game with many emoji sets, handling flipping, matching, scoring, and completion logic.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Presents age‑appropriate problem‑solving scenarios with selectable options, scoring correct answers across multiple categories.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Runs a timed reaction game where players tap the correct target among distractors, progressing through multiple rounds based on age group settings.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Builds configurable shape‑matching rounds using rules and generated shape pairs, tracking matches, moves, and level progression.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Implements a sorting game where children assign items to categories, tracking selections, correctness, and game completion.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Provides a visual recognition find-the-differences game with randomized difference points, scene switching, and completion logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with mascot, title, language selector, music selector, and a home button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown menu for switching the app's language using the language context.
frontend/src/config/audioConfig.ts: Defines logic to detect and enable Android WebView–only audio mode via runtime config or environment variables.
frontend/src/contexts/BackgroundMusicCon: Context for selecting and persisting background music tracks using localStorage and providing track state to the app.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Manages current language selection with validation, persistence, and mapping to backend language enums.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppBackgroundMusic: Handles background audio playback with Android bridge support and user-interaction gating while preventing duplicate playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundAudio.ts: Plays background audio after user interaction, ensuring no autoplay violations and avoiding unnecessary restarts.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageCache.ts: This file is currently empty or contains no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that fetch games, questions, messages, and puzzles from the backend based on age group and language.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: Provides a React Query hook to fetch randomized quiz questions from the backend using age group, language, and count.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a colorful children-friendly theme and utility animations.
Exports a list of selectable background music options with IDs and labels.

frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Implements daily surprise game selection per age group with deterministic randomization and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Provides a large fallback pool of quiz questions in multiple languages organized by age group.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Provides quiz question selection with shuffling, history tracking, and repeat reduction using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRoundConfi: Generates shape‑matching round settings based on age group and level, defining pair counts, shape types, and rule options.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRules.ts: Defines matching rules for shapes with evaluators and age restrictions, and filters rules by age group.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationIt: Contains item pools and category sets for sorting/classification, organized by age group with expanded items.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationSe: Selects session items with shuffling, repetition avoidance, validation, and localStorage‑based history.
frontend/src/lib/sounds.ts: Lists valid sound effect and background IDs and provides type‑safe validators for sound IDs.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines translation strings and supported language codes for the app’s UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Displays a template grid for coloring, loads backend or fallback templates, handles image failures, and opens a coloring canvas when a template is selected.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Loads age‑appropriate games, shows a list, and launches the selected game with celebration handling upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the welcome screen, handles age selection, and provides navigation to games, quizzes, or coloring.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: Runs a quiz session using backend or fallback questions, tracks progress and score, and shows results with celebration logic.
frontend/src/services/audio.ts: Provides sound playback via Android bridge or web audio, including effects and looping background audio with validation and fallback handling.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares TypeScript definitions for the Android WebView audio bridge exposed on the global window object.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including offline and audio reliability requirements, existing features, new requests, and Android WebView integration notes.
